Oh? What’s that? 

The majority of Americans respect when you break down reasonable policy proposals that are designed to combat runaway income inequality and help fund priorities they value most?

We can win public sentiment, stand our ground, & not be scared by GOP information. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1085221097426038784 QT @thehill NEW POLL: Majority of Americans support raising the top tax rate to 70 percent https://thehill.com/hilltv/what-americas-thinking/425422-a-majority-of-americans-support-raising-the-top-tax-rate-to-70 (via @HillTVLive) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw961jCX0AE13j1.jpg
Misinformation**

I questioned Barr if it would be appropriate to go against the advice of DOJ ethics officials if they recommended he recuse himself from the Mueller probe. Barr said he would if he disagreed with them. Unacceptable.

Two years ago today we celebrated #MLK Day with patients and advocates across the USA to save health care. 

We organized 10,000 grassroots events to stop the GOP from taking health care away from millions of people and we won’t stop fighting #ForThePeople to #ProtectOurCare! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1085315406070333440/pu/img/lAVOytqpGLRmB9iu.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1085315406070333440/pu/vid/320x180/gkiOBcbE3r-n4Zpy.mp4?tag=8

RT @NORML BREAKING: Attorney General nominee William Barr just committed to @CoryBooker that he would not use federal resources to prosecute state-legal cannabis businesses, but did say that he supports the federal policy of prohibition. 

More to come...

Folks across the country are struggling to pay their mortgages, put food on the table, and pay off their medical bills. No one should struggle just to get by. That’s why I introduced the Rent Relief Act and the LIFT Act, two bills that would address the cost of living crisis.

RT @ABCPolitics Speaker Nancy Pelosi on protracted government shutdown: "It's a temper tantrum by the president. I'm the mother of five, grandmother of nine. I know a temper tantrum when I see one." https://trib.al/lrpXEU9 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwqecgaVsAAuUrM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1083852809865289729/vid/320x180/-hIG0LDKLZMtnvv-.mp4?tag=9

From missed research windows to gaps in day-to-day data sets, the damage being done by the government shutdown to the scientific community cannot be overstated. 
https://twitter.com/CBSNews/status/1084953180734144512 QT @CBSNews The government shutdown disrupts crucial scientific work — and the damage is felt worldwide https://www.cbsnews.com/news/science-gets-shut-down-along-with-the-federal-government/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab7e&linkId=62356852 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw6HKxkW0AAJnx4.jpg

Explaining marginal taxes to a far-right former Governor:

Imagine if you did chores for abuela & she gave you $10. When you got home, you got to keep it, because it’s only $10.

Then we taxed the billionaire in town because he’s making tons of money underpaying the townspeople. https://twitter.com/scottwalker/status/1085199713463422981 QT @ScottWalker Explaining tax rates before Reagan to 5th graders: “Imagine if you did chores for your grandma and she gave you $10.  When you got home, your parents took $7 from you.”  The students said: “That’s not fair!” Even 5th graders get it.
Happy Founders’ Day. Celebrating 111 years of Service to All Mankind. #J15 #SkeeWee #1908 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-RPraX0AENSKK.jpg

Pleased that @POTUS signed the Combating European Anti-Semitism Act, which I led in the Senate with @timkaine to enhance U.S. efforts to partner with our European allies to combat the rise of anti-Semitism across Europe.

Wonderful. Just wonderful. https://twitter.com/dmartosko/status/1085285313780551681 QT @dmartosko If you have kids, you know these are the BEST photos of the month. Attorney general nominee Bill Barr's young grandson, Liam, had a notepad during today's confirmation hearing.  (Photos: @Reuters) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-1PRLV4AA4mZM.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-1PRLVAAAmEH2.jpg

"…lives are on the line." 
This is outrageous. Domestic violence shelters provide critical support for survivors in their moments of need. We must reopen the government immediately. https://www.glamour.com/story/government-shutdown-domestic-violence-shelters

William Barr *literally* wrote & published a book called "The Case for More Incarceration" while leading the Department of Justice. Found a copy in a law library. It's real.

The fight for criminal justice reform has made so much progress – we can't let forces take us back. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-ecwYWsAEruL1.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-ec4TXcAAYtf4.jpg

It is long past time for Congress to hold itself accountable.

It is long past time for term limits.

RT @RepSchneider Flying to Washington yesterday I met a TSA agent working without pay because of shutdown. She is a single mother raising a 15 year-old daughter, & her family is struggling to make ends meet without her paycheck. #ShutdownStories

RT @axios Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, who has rejected corporate campaign donations and called for the biggest banks to be broken up, has been recommended for a seat on the powerful House Financial Services Committee, Bloomberg reports. https://www.axios.com/ocasio-cortez-set-to-join-house-financial-services-committee--7eafb803-0319-4fbe-a05f-9ea895ca8000.html?stream=top-stories&utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=limstream

Families with children are unlawfully crossing the border in record numbers. It is overwhelming our border agents & creating a dire humanitarian crisis. 

This is a crisis. It needs to be addressed immediately. But Democratic leaders would rather win the shutdown.

RT @sfpelosi Two years ago today we celebrated #MLK’s Birthday by taking Our First Stand -   @SpeakerPelosi rallied us to #ProtectOurCare - establishing health care as the cause of our resistance and the engine that drove our successful effort to win back the House #forthepeople! #tbt http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw9wGyyUUAAMUAj.jpg

These are just some of the stories of nearly 800,000 federal workers who are suffering from the #TrumpShutdown.

RT @RepRickLarsen Since the partial shutdown began, I have heard from people across WA02 about impacts. One Skagit woman's @USDA Rural Development Housing Voucher was not finalized before the shutdown. Result: she has been unable to move to her apartment & is staying in a motel #ShutdownStories

Hi all - Senator Harris is returning for a second round of questioning at the Judiciary Committee hearing on the nomination of William Barr. Watch live here as the hearing continues. https://twitter.com/i/broadcasts/1YqxorWwPpyJv

A few moments ago I reminded Attorney General nominee William Barr that the War on Drugs has been an abject failure. 

America has an addiction crisis and we should be putting our resources toward combatting drug addiction, not locking people up.

RT @voxdotcom @awprokop Barr and Sen. Cory Booker are discussing Barr's record on criminal justice. 

Barr once said that it was “simply a myth” that there were “sympathetic people” and “hapless victims of the criminal justice system” in prisons, Salon reports. https://www.vox.com/policy-and-politics/2018/12/7/18129487/william-barr-trump-attorney-general-criminal-justice-reform?utm_campaign=vox.social&utm_medium=social&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1547522868

For the first time ever, more Americans are dying from opioid overdoses than vehicle crashes. This is a public health crisis and it’s time this Administration confronted it head-on. 
https://twitter.com/npr/status/1084811119506743296 QT @NPR For the first time in U.S. history, Americans are more likely to die of an opioid overdose than in a vehicle crash, according to a new report. Americans now have a 1 in 96 chance of dying from an opioid overdose.
https://www.npr.org/2019/01/14/684695273/report-americans-are-now-more-likely-to-die-of-an-opioid-overdose-than-on-the-ro?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20190114

Today is the confirmation hearing on William Barr, Trump's pick for AG. I have objections. Take for example, this awful claim from Barr:
“The benefits of increased incarceration would be enjoyed disproportionately by black Americans living in inner cities.”

Absolutely not. ❌

5 yrs ago Chinese authorities detained Uyghur scholar Ilham Tohti & sentenced him to life in prison. Today #China maintains a vast network of “political reeducation” camps targeting Uyghur Muslims for internment while lobbying other countries not to criticize their rights abuses. https://twitter.com/WSJ/status/1083895096435752962 QT @WSJ Beijing has escalated efforts to repel foreign criticism of its policing, mass detentions and forced-assimilation measures targeting Muslims in the restive Xinjiang region https://trib.al/m3Z0s1e

I grew up in Harrington Park - incredible community - where I started learning about our criminal justice system. 

For the last 20+ yrs I've lived in Newark - incredible community - where I witnessed a very different and broken criminal justice system. 

We must demand fairness https://twitter.com/mackaymeadows/status/1085263165997436928 QT @MacKayMeadows Cory booker said he was from the inner city. Isnt he from harrington park NJ? @TheFive @greggutfeld

1. Reach out to any Fed workers we know, check-in & offer help
2. Put pressure on McConnell & the President
3. If you’re affected by the #TrumpShutdown, share w/ her & she‘ll RT http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw_POQ-UYAA5ABB.jpg

My questions exactly. https://twitter.com/hmorley29/status/1085263532218814470 QT @hmorley29 #Barr definitely came out looking out of touch when questions by Senator Cory Booker about rascism in the system. As a former AG how could he not know or read about such a mainstream concept? Does he not read law journals? Or the NYT, WSJ or even buzzfeed?

Over 60 countries including the U.S. have stated that Maduro is not the legitimate President of #Venezuela. 

I have asked @POTUS to recognize @jguaido as the legitimate transitional President of #Venezuela if the National Assembly invokes Article 233 of the constitution.

I spoke on the Senate floor in support of the Venezuela's Provisional Government, under the leadership of @jguaido. The U.S. and its regional allies must stand in support of the people of #Venezuela in this historic time.

Watch here: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=XVbU0bssvoQ

RT @mkraju Cory Booker starts off his questioning of Bill Barr asking him about medical marijuana, and Barr suggests that he will allow medical marijuana to continue. His goal is to "not to upset settled expectations," Barr said

RT @Lyncherator Sen @CoryBooker got this commitment from Barr during his time for questioning. Marijuana has been a top criminal justice issue for Booker https://twitter.com/NickRiccardi/status/1085260569286828032 QT @NickRiccardi WASHINGTON (AP) — Attorney general nominee Bill Barr says he would 'not go after' marijuana companies in states where cannabis is legal.

William Barr has already expressed his bias against the Mueller investigation – that alone should disqualify him from serving as Attorney General. He also wants to gut the ACA, thinks Roe v Wade should be overturned, & has a troubling record on criminal justice. I'll vote no.

RT @NAACP_LDF @SenBooker: "When you talk about Chicago in the way you just did, it brings up racial fears or racial concerns...You stated that if a Black and a white...are charged with the same offense, generally they'll get the same treatment in the system and ultimately the same penalty." http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1085259952237760513/pu/img/xz_06Yt3kcEHApcH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1085259952237760513/pu/vid/320x180/LIAw1jRBZR5bFxqb.mp4?tag=8

However, if we want a federal approach, if we want states to have their own laws..." (cont.) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-j6TLWwAcN36V.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1085265017275072513/vid/320x180/6_9uYxC2pe0lnToE.mp4?tag=11

I agree with @realDonaldTrump! It’s time to declare victory in Afghanistan and bring our troops home. We spend $46 BILLION a year in Afghanistan! How about we take that money and build roads and bridges and strengthen border security here in America? #AmericaFirst

This is an important first victory. Putting a citizenship question on the census is a cynical and sinister attempt to suppress participation and undercount immigrants short changing fair apportionment of resources and political representation. The fight continues. https://twitter.com/hansilowang/status/1085182716109307905 QT @hansilowang BREAKING: Judge rules against Trump admin plans to add #citizenshipquestion to #2020census, setting up a likely Supreme Court fight. The cancer on the soul of our nation is the disproportionate impact of our criminal justice system on vulnerable communities – people of color, mentally ill, addicted, victims of sexual trauma.

RT @civilrightsorg Thank you, Sen. @CoryBooker, for challenging William Barr about racial bias in the justice system.

Here's what we know: Our nation deserves an Attorney General who understands that racism is painfully present at every stage of our nation's justice system. #SaveJustice http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dw-c6r0WoAEa_yl.jpg

While labor productivity has more than doubled since the late 1960s, nearly half of all new income generated in the U.S. since 1993 has gone to the top 1 percent.

This is what we mean when we say the economy is rigged in favor of the wealthy.

RT @NAACP .@corybooker questions #WilliamBarr on racial disparities in criminal justice system. Barr says, "Overall, the system treats blacks and whites fairly. " 

We strongly disagree. And we need an AG who understands racism in justice system.
